name: Zeno's Division
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Any number of creatures you choose within range must succeed on an Intuition saving throw or be affected by this spell, as you warp space to prevent their escape. Whenever they would move away from you, they must use 2 feet of movement for every 1 foot moved.

Against affected targets, you can move 2 feet closer per 1 foot moved when you move towards them, and you treat them as if they were half as far away from you for the purposes of attacks and spells targeting them.
